settings.title: Settings
settings.generalDescription: Manage general configurations and preferences, including language, app navigator location, and theme settings.
settings.languageAndRegionDescription: Configure your preferred language and regional settings for the application.
settings.appearanceDescription: Customize the visual appearance and theme of your application.

languageAndRegion.title: Language and Region
languageAndRegion.description: Configure your preferred language and regional settings for the application.
languageAndRegion.selectLanguage: Select the language for the application interface
